question: Three polaroid sheets are co-axially placed as indicated in the diagram. Pass axes of the polaroids 2 and 3 make $30^{\circ}$ and $90^{\circ}$ with pass axis of polaroid sheet 1. If $I_{0}$ is the intensity of the incident unpolarised light entering sheet 1, the intensity of the emergent light through sheet 3 is
images/f6a7b8c9-d0e1-4f2a-3b4c-5d6e7f8a9b0c.png
explanation: After P3 ($90^{\circ}$ relative to P1, so $60^{\circ}$ relative to P2): $I_3 = I_2 \cos^2(60) = (3I_0/8)(1/4) = 3I_0/32$.
